ios.debug.name: reactDetox
ios.debug.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/reactDetox.xcworkspace -scheme reactDetox -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -UseModernBuildSystem=YES -quiet

ios.release.name: reactDetox
ios.release.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/reactDetox.xcworkspace -scheme reactDetox -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -UseModernBuildSystem=YES -quiet
